title: Prioritizing a new CVE
description: A new critical CVE is announced. A threat intelligence analyst must determine its relevance and risk to the organization.

tasks.description: Analyze the CVE details to understand the affected software and the nature of the vulnerability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst understands the technical details of the new CVE.

tasks.description: Check threat intelligence feeds to see if the CVE is being actively exploited in the wild.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst confirms that multiple threat actors are already exploiting this CVE.

tasks.description: Combine the technical severity of the CVE with the evidence of active exploitation to assign it the highest possible internal priority for patching.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst makes an accurate risk-based decision to escalate the priority of the vulnerability.
